channel.title: Sh on Karthikeyan Sundararajan
channel.description: Recent content in Sh on Karthikeyan Sundararajan

item.title: ecs-shell
item.description: Get shell of a container running on ECS ECS is a managed container orchestration service by AWS. Known for its simplicity, especially ECS Fargate. Since ECS Fargate nodes are completely managed by AWS, there is no way to SSH into the node. Also ECS was lacking a command line option just like, kubectl exec On March 2021, AWS launched a feature which is similar to “kubectl exec” to obtain a shell access of a container running on ECS Fargate.
